transformations.name: NewestExchangeDates
transformations.description: Get newest ExchangeFromDate for each currency

transformations.name: JoinNewestDateWithRate
transformations.description: Inner join to get newest exchange rate for each currency

transformations.name: Expression
transformations.description:
Case currency from is USD, rate equals 1.
Add last_updated_by column

transformations.name: DeriveHashedColumn
transformations.description: Derive hashed column used to check for updated values

transformations.name: HashedValue
transformations.description: Creating hashed column from other values, used to check for updates

transformations.name: NewOrUpdatedRows
transformations.description: Compare with existing rows in sink table to filter on new or updated rows.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FROM_CURRENCY_ID as double,
		TO_CURRENCY_ID as double,
		EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE as timestamp,
		EXCHANGE_RATE as decimal(38,18),
		EXCHANGE_TO_DATE as timestamp,
		FROM_CURRENCY_CODE as string,
		TO_CURRENCY_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HlpExchangeRateToUsd
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> tCrossReference
source(output(
		pk_key as string,
		cur_description as string,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd as decimal(12,2),
		last_updated_by as string,
		HashedValues as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_currency.parquet']) ~> PreDimCurrencyInput
exchrateToUSD filter(exchange_from_date <= currentTimestamp()) ~> FilterDates
HlpExchangeRateToUsd select(mapColumn(
		exchange_from_date = EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE,
		exchange_rate = EXCHANGE_RATE,
		from_currency_code = FROM_CURRENCY_CODE,
		to_currency_code = TO_CURRENCY_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> exchrateToUSD
RemoveUnusedColumns filter(code_type_id == 124) ~> xrefCurrency
exchrateToUSD select(mapColumn(
		exchange_rate,
		from_currency_code,
		exchange_from_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExhangeRate
FilterDates aggregate(groupBy(from_currency_code),
	EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE = max(exchange_from_date)) ~> NewestExchangeDates
NewestExchangeDates, SelectExhangeRate join(NewestExchangeDates@from_currency_code == SelectExhangeRate@from_currency_code
	&& NewestExchangeDates@EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE == SelectExhangeRate@exchange_from_date,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinNewestDateWithRate
RemoveExtraColumn derive(exchange_rate = case(exchange_rate==0, toDecimal(null()),toDecimal(exchange_rate))) ~> LastKnownRate
tCrossReference select(mapColumn(
		target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		target_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		code_type_id = CODE_TYPE_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnusedColumns
xrefCurrency aggregate(groupBy(target_code),
	target_description = first(target_description)) ~> Deduplicate
JoinNewestDateWithRate select(mapColumn(
		from_currency_code = NewestExchangeDates@from_currency_code,
		exchange_rate,
		from_currency_code = SelectExhangeRate@from_currency_code,
		exchange_from_date = SelectExhangeRate@exchange_from_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveExtraColumn
ReplaceNull derive(curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd = case(from_currency_code=='USD', toDecimal(1), exchange_rate),
		last_updated_by = 'pre_dim_currency') ~> Expression
Deduplicate, LastKnownRate lookup(target_code == from_currency_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupAllCurrencies
Expression select(mapColumn(
		pk_key = ReplaceNull@from_currency_code,
		cur_description = target_description,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd,
		last_updated_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutputColums
LookupAllCurrencies derive(from_currency_code = case(isNull(from_currency_code),'N/A',from_currency_code)) ~> ReplaceNull
PreDimCurrencyInput derive(ExistingHashed = sha1(pk_key,cur_description,curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd)) ~> DeriveHashedColumn
DeriveHashedColumn select(mapColumn(
		ExistingHashed
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimCurrencyHashed
SelectOutputColums derive(HashedValues = sha1(pk_key,cur_description,curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd)) ~> HashedValue
HashedValue, preDimCurrencyHashed exists(HashedValues == ExistingHashed,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> NewOrUpdatedRows
NewOrUpdatedRows alterRow(upsertIf(! isNull(pk_key))) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_currency.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimCurrency
